src_original: kastrātā tava putraketi kṛpaṇaṃ dikṣu kṣipantyā dṛśam |
cañcurnaiva khagādhipasya hṛdayaṃ vajreṇa manye kṛtam |9 ||
yaiḥ kāruṇyaparigrahānna gaṇitaḥ svārthaḥ parārtha prati |  ye nityaṃ paraduḥkhaduḥkhitadhiyaste sādhavo'staṃ gatā  mātaḥ ! saṃhara bāṣpavegamadhunā kasyāgrato rudyate ? ||10 ||
prāṇāṃstāneṣa sādhustṛṇamiva kṛpayā yaḥ parārtha dadāti ||15 ||
jāyante ca mriyante ca mādṛśāḥ kṣudrajantavaḥ |
tulyāḥ saṃvarttakābhraīḥ pidadhati gaganaṃ paṅktayaḥ pakṣatīnāṃ  tīre vegānilo'mbhaḥ kṣipati bhuva iva lāvanāyāmburāśeḥ |
kurvan kalpāntaśaṅkāṃ sapadi ca sabhayaṃ vīkṣito digdvipendrai
śayitena māturaṅke visrabdhaṃ śaiśave na tat prāptam |
